SELECT favoritew_no, favoritew_reg_date, with_pet_no, building, road, tel, (SELECT nickname FROM members WHERE nickname='aa') as nickname FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rn, f.favoritew_no, f.favoritew_reg_date, w.with_pet_no, w.building, w.road, w.tel, (SELECT nickname FROM members WHERE nickname = f.nickname) as nickname FROM favoritew f JOIN with_pet w ON f.with_pet_no = w.with_pet_no WHERE ROWNUM <= ( #{cri.pageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} * #{cri.amount} ) ) WHERE rn > ( ( #{cri.pageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} - 1 ) * #{cri.amount} )
